snippet.title: Sift Heads: World Act 2 - (Flash Game) #255
snippet.description:
Author : Pyrozen
Published By : Gamesfree.ca
Original Description : ↴
With the Yakuza on their tail, Kiro, Vinnie and Shorty will fly to Tokyo Japan to confront a crime lord that is set on getting Kiro's head. This new Sift Heads World episode has more of what you like; character selection, more custom costumes, plenty of new weapons and a new interactive city to explore.
